Description.Text:
Property Location
A stay at Surfers Riverside Apartments places you in the heart of Surfers Paradise, convenient to SkyPoint Observation Deck and Sea World. This family-friendly apartment is within close proximity of Cavill Avenue and Timezone.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 16 air-conditioned rooms featuring kitchens with refrigerators and microwaves. Wireless Internet access (surcharge) keeps you connected, and DVD players are provided for your entertainment. Conveniences include washers/dryers and ceiling fans, and housekeeping is provided once per stay.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Enjoy recreation amenities such as an outdoor pool or take in the view from a garden. Additional amenities include wireless Internet access (surcharge), tour/ticket assistance, and barbecue grills.

Dining
Take advantage of the apartment's room service (during limited hours).

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include express check-in, express check-out, and laundry facilities. Free self parking is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is 10 AM
